bettergrass.midnightconfig.title: FabricBetterGrass
bettergrass.midnightconfig.warn: §cWorld reload or F3+A is required to apply changes.
bettergrass.midnightconfig.betterGrassMo:
§4Off §r- Grass Blocks will look normal
§3Fast §r- Top Grass texture will be applied on all the sides of Grass Blocks (fast)
§dFancy §r- Top Grass texture will be applied dynamically on the sides of Grass Blocks (slow)
bettergrass.midnightconfig.blockstates.t: Grass-like blocks that should be connected on slopes.
